name: OctopusPush
description: There is a later version of this task, we recommend using the latest version. Push your NuGet or Zip package to your Octopus Deploy Server
author: Octopus Deploy

inputs.name: Space
inputs.label: Space (Legacy - Use version 4 of this task)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version 3 of this task has limited support for spaces. We recommend using version 4 of this task for a better experience.

inputs.name: Package
inputs.label: Package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Package file to push. To push multiple packages, enter on multiple lines.

inputs.name: Replace
inputs.label: Replace Existing
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the package already exists in the repository, the default behavior is to reject the new package being pushed. Set this flag to 'True' to overwrite the existing package.

inputs.name: AdditionalArguments
inputs.label: Additional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments to be supplied to the Octopus CLI. See the [Octopus CLI documentation](https://g.octopushq.com/OctoExePush) for available parameters.
